metadata.name: Fridgescape #1 (Martina and Federico)
metadata.description:
The day after Martina's birthday (Milan, 2021)
4584 × 6112

This image is part of my series of Fridgescapes, which depicts fridges' interiors in Italy, where I live, and in other places around the world. 
I love to talk about food and to take photos in other people's houses. Fridge seems a private space, but when I ask to photograph it no one ever says no.
It very interesting to look at all the details, the food stored, the sauces and drinks, and imagine people's life.

I did this photo the day after Martina's birthday in our home in Milano.
